title: Lindisfarne
name: Lindisfarne Castle
hours: Opening times vary due to tides, either 10:00 - 15:00, 10:00 - 16:00, 12:00 - 17:00, or 11:00 - 17:00
content: The 16th Century Tudor castle, later converted into an Edwardian home is situated high on a rocky crag, affording good views of the island, Bamburgh Castle and the surrounding North Sea (weather permitting!) The castle is a National Trust property.
